descriptionHtml:
Love Interest tweaks MOD.

        The game gives no option to tell to your wife or husband to follow you and i wanted to do
        something about it. Currently im using UFO mod, good to make essential you love  
        interest or teach spells etc.
 
   	1. No -My thane- dialog with married housecarl.
	Housecarl wife is removed from the housecarls faction and no longer speak 
        to you as thane by dialog or menu options.
	
	2. Follower.
	It makes possible to ask your love interest (non combatant character) to 
        follow you and also give them some combat skills,

	Female characters uses light armor and male heavy, the character skills are 
        coded to increase the same as you do (a little lower, random percentage of your current skills).
	
	For now, this is scripted in the code that adds money to the spouse shop, the changes will take effect after 24 hours. The mod will not work i assume if you marry an npc that cannot create a shop. 

-----------
Update.
Corrected changing of stats, stats are changed to the new follower, and not already follower wife. 
-----------

  About uninstall:
	The game will save this factions and character changes in the savegame file, 
        so even if you delete the mod the changes will persist.
	
	If you want housecarl wife/husband to restore the previous status 
        after uninstalling the mod do this:
	
	Housecarl:
		Open the console
			Click on the character
		Type
			SetFactionRank 000a2c8d 1
	
	Wife follower:
		Open the console
			Click on the character
		Type
			SetFactionRank 0005c84d -1
author: nb77
